item.title: Supreme Court rules Trump can revoke protected status for 500,000 immigrants pending appeal
item.description: The Supreme Court's decision affects immigrants from Cuba, Haiti, Nicaragua, and Venezuela who had fled their conflict-ridden countries.

item.title: Trump accuses China of violating preliminary trade deal
item.description: The U.S. and China in mid-May agreed to a 90-day suspension on most tariffs after Trump slapped sky-high tariffs on the big U.S. trade partner.

item.title: Trump tariffs reinstated by appeals court for now
item.description: Three judges — including a Trump appointee — on a federal trade court had invalidated all of Trump's "reciprocal" tariffs and other duties.

item.title: Trump could ask Supreme Court to halt tariff block as soon as Friday
item.description: Trump trade advisor Peter Navarro said the administration has other tariff options available, even if the Court of International Trade ruling stands.

item.title: Federal trade court strikes down Trump's reciprocal tariffs
item.description: The Supreme Court could end up ruling if Trump has authority under the International Emergency Economic Powers Act to impose universal duties on impor...
